item.description: Dance at the Ashworth By the Sea, Friday June 1st Dinner 7:30 pm.,or Dancing at 9 pm. Ashworth Hotel. Hampton Beach NH. Host: Steve Ob1  603-491-1962  ob@tds.net   Come out, have some fun Friday night at the Breakers Restaurant inside the Ashworth Hotel. If you like, come early and have something to eat or just come and sit and talk. Help us hold some tables. This DJ doesn't mind taking requests so bring your dancing shoes! We will be meeting for conversation and dinner at 7:30 on Friday June 1st. Feel free to come for dinner or just for dancing. We just can't hold any seats or tables without you there to hold them. The DJ starts playing at 9:00 and runs until 1:00. There will be people from other groups joining us as well. We usually sit all the way to the back of the room to the left of the dance floor or as close to there as possible! We'll have signs on the table. Hope to see you there :)
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Dance / Dinner by the Sea
